ValidationRule.description: requires the Referring Employee field be populated when the Lead Source field value is Referral-Independent Ins. Agent
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BEGINS($RecordType.Name, 'PC Opportunity'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')), ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, 'Referral-Independent Ins. Agent'), ISBLANK( Referral_Contact__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Independent Agent name is required to be entered in the Referral Contact field when the Lead Source selected is Referral-Independent Ins. Agent
